short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tutbob aids students in engaging with and retaining learning materials using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tutbob is a Chrome extension that uses advanced artificial intelligence technology to help university students effectively engage with, understand, and retain their learning materials. Tutbob offers an interactive and seamless learning experience that caters to the evolving needs of the education industry. The user-friendly design ensures easy navigation, making it accessible to students from all backgrounds. With support for multiple languages, it promotes inclusivity and accessibility for both domestic and international students, with the aim of improving communication and understanding between students and instructors.

Features

Sorted Archive
Quickly find resources!
Say goodbye to guesswork when searching for information. Tutbob organises all your recordings in your profile, allowing you to effortlessly search for any course or lecture. Access all your notes, summaries, and revision resources anytime, anywhere. With Tutbob's Sorted Archive, finding and managing your educational materials has never been easier. 

Summary of key concepts
Stay on top of your learning!
After each session, Tutbob compiles concise summaries highlighting all the key concepts you extracted. Whether it's a lecture, video, or discussion, these summaries provide a clear and focused overview, helping you retain information quickly. With Tutbob, you can review key points efficiently, ensuring that you retain and understand the core concepts essential for your academic success. 

Notes Archive
Streamline your study sessions!
With Tutbob's Notes Archive, you can easily revisit and review all the important information captured from your recordings. Each note is timestamped, allowing you to revisit specific moments quickly and efficiently. Whether you're looking to apply material to your assignments or need to find crucial details like due dates, Tutbob's search function makes it simple to locate the information you need.

Flashcards
Recall and comprehend!
Easily master all the key concepts from your 10-minute summaries with interactive flashcards. Each flashcard is carefully designed to capture essential information from your lectures and recordings. Whether you're gearing up for exams or simply reviewing course material, Tutbob's interactive flashcards will take your understanding and retention of critical concepts to the next level!

Quiz
Reinforce Your Learning!
Practice Makes Perfect, and with Tutbob, you can take your learning to the next level! Tutbob creates custom quizzes from your own recordings, allowing you to actively engage with your learning. Test your knowledge, pinpoint areas of improvement, and solidify your understanding through multiple-choice questions, short answers, and long answers designed to reinforce your understanding of key concepts.
